edge: Both films were shot back-to-back in South Africa in 2019. The production of the third film was announced in July 2020, after the release of the second film.
Marcello again directs the third film, as he did for the previous two movies.
Charlbi Dean King reprises her role in the third film, as she did in the previous films.
Karan Soni Elordi appears in the third movie, having also acted in the earlier movies.
Clare-Hope Ashitey plays a part in the third movie, as she did in the previous films.
Niki Walker appears in the third movie, which was filmed together with the second movie.
Gugu Mbatha-Raw and Leonardo Seeman act in both the third and second films, which were simultaneously shot.
Orlando Bloom appears in the third movie, which was filmed concurrently with the second movie, as he did previously.
